example.source: <a:notifier id = "notiTest3" margin = "20" position = "bottom-right" timeout = "2" skin = "smoke" arrange = "vertical" columnsize = "200"> </a:notifier> <a:frame caption="Choose notifier's arrangement" width="400"> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest3.setAttribute('arrange','vertical')" checked = "true" group = "arr">Vertical</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest3.setAttribute('arrange','horizontal')" group = "arr">Horizontal</a:radiobutton> </a:frame> <a:hbox width="400" height="34" margin="10 0 0 0"> <a:button width = "100" onclick = "notiTest3.popup('Demoing the arrangement feature')"> Show </a:button> </a:hbox>

<a:notifier id = "notiTest2" position = "bottom-left" margin = "20" skin = "bubble" timeout = "2" arrange = "horizontal" columnsize = "200"> <a:event when = "{notiTest2.position}" message = "Notifier display position has been changed"> </a:event> </a:notifier> <a:frame caption="Choose notifier's position" width="400"> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest2.setAttribute('position', 'right-top');" value = "right-top" group = "pos" checked = "true">Right Top</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest2.setAttribute('position', 'left-top');" value = "left-top" group = "pos">Left Top</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest2.setAttribute('position', 'bottom-left');" value = "bottom-left" group = "pos">Left Bottom</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest2.setAttribute('position', 'bottom-right');" value = "bottom-right" group = "pos">Right Bottom</a:radiobutton> <a:radiobutton onclick = "notiTest2.setAttribute('position', 'center-center');" value = "center-center" group = "pos">Center Center</a:radiobutton> </a:frame> <a:hbox width="400" height="34" margin="10 0 0 0"> <a:button width = "100" onclick = "notiTest2.popup('Demoing the arrangement feature')"> Show </a:button> </a:hbox>

example.description: Choose 24th of December in 2008 (Icons created by http://www.visualpharm.com).
example.source: <a:notifier id = "notiTest4" position = "bottom-left" margin = "20" timeout = "2" skin = "bubble" arrange = "horizontal" columnsize = "200"> <a:event when = "{cdd2.value == '2008-12-24'}" message = "Merry Christmas!" icon = "Butterfly_48x48.png"> </a:event> </a:notifier> <a:caldropdown id = "cdd2" value = "2008-12-01" output-format = "yyyy-mm-dd"> </a:caldropdown>
